string.text: Guys, all who can hear me help! The military has us pinned down at the factory.
Cops squeezed my yard. Help brothers!
Bullseye, come on up and get out of here, the military will not let you just walk away. I reported you to the Bartender - he must negotiate with dolgozni you missed.
The shooter I'll tell you. Fang died. You are not caught. You should not single to center went. However it's up. Who and where to find you know. Ghost.
